K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-011:128b-0: @128b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-011:128b-1: dkon mchog gsum gyi rten la sngags 'di lan re brjod cing brkyang phyag re byas te phyag gsum byas na sde snod gsum bros [?] pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-011:129a-2: nyi ma re re phyag gsum gsum byas na tshe 'di nyid la mthong pa'i lam gyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-011:129a-3: de ma thob kyi bar du mi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-011:129a-6: nad rims kyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-011:129a-7: aom na mo manydzu shri ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-011:129a-9: na ma aatta ma shri ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-011:129a-10: phyag bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
